ModMetaData.name: Stargates (Continued)
ModMetaData.author: CatCraftYT, CommanderJroc
ModMetaData.description:
Adds Stargates! That's about it.
I have hard-forked the stargate mod, so I can continue to maintain it.
I will also be contributing back to upstream the 1.6 github patch after I clean up the source code and such. But, I am unsure if my patches will be accepted, so I figured a hard fork was okay. Once, they are accepted, this mod should be able to be unsubscribed and you can use the origional mod by CatCraftYT.
